content: Unfortunately these infrastructure changes take time, and enthusiasm, to get done. Kevin and I have been working on removing some more uses of is_subgroup at #3321 --- anyone who wants to jump in and deal with some errors on that branch would be very welcome!
A PR creating subring, following the model of the recent PR which created subgroup, would also be a fantastic contribution.
Note that we already have subsemiring. This can be used as an example of mixing * and +.
